lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Pelo meus crias eu também mato e morro' → 'For my children, I would kill and die too.'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Fora da lei
lines.translation: Outside the law
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Fora da lei' → 'Outside the law'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Se não quer problema, então deixa o trem caro passar
lines.translation: If you don't want trouble, then let the expensive train pass.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Se não quer problema, então deixa o trem caro passar' → 'If you don't want trouble, then let the expensive train pass.'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Se eles falar que tem peito então manda peitar
lines.translation: If they say they have breasts, then tell them to confront them.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Se eles falar que tem peito então manda peitar' → 'If they say they have breasts, then tell them to confront them.'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Que o papo do mano é um só, nóis não vai recuar
lines.translation: Because the brother's message is the same, we're not going to back down.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Que o papo do mano é um só, nóis não vai recuar' → 'Because the brother's message is the same, we're not going to back down.'. lines.text: Nóis não vai recuar, porquê
lines.translation: We will not back down, because
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Nóis não vai recuar, porquê' → 'We will not back down, because'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Tá na paz de Deus
lines.translation: He's at peace with God.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Tá na paz de Deus' → 'He's at peace with God.'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Que permaneça essa tranquilidade na comunidade, uh
lines.translation: May this tranquility remain in the community, uh

lines.text: Peço a lili' dos amigo que estão privado, lili'
lines.translation: I ask for the lili' of the friends who are deprived, lili'
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. lines.text: Saudade bate no meu peito dos cria que não estão mais aqui, aqui
lines.translation: My heart aches with longing for the children who are no longer here.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis.
